ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 245
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 03/13/2000 8:09:06 PM Eastern Standard Time, Aidanz2@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 03/13/2000 8:09:06 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Aidanz2@... writes:

<< Whenever i'm low on cash i just go bak to sf and load
up. As for newboes getting killed the garud killers usually helpem. >>

In my opinion, the problem is what you said earlier: it makes it that much
easier to get items/cash...it's obviously really hurting the economy...soon
plat won't be valuable to anyone, for the same reasons it is worthless to
higher levels. The entire reason guard killers don't loot the plat is because
they don't need it...while that's ok for them. But "newbies" shouldn't be
able to gain plat so easily. At level 5, it takes about 30 minutes to earn a
plat, but with guard killing it takes 5 seconds to earn 4 plat. . .
Just my opinion.
Corey
